node.excerpt: 2019 marks a new year. And with each new year, it’s time for new resolutions. It’s a promise to be better, to fix the mistakes of yesterday…
And suddenly, a year has passed. Just like that. Another year older, perhaps wiser. Hopefully wiser. I feel each year carries a heavier toll…
It’s been five months in Toronto, and five months since I last wrote. I think, that looking back, I feel that many of the struggles were…
So - big news for me. I’ll be finally moving to Toronto! I’ll be starting as a Junior Software Developer at Quartermaster. Let’s get this…
Oops, this is the first update in almost three months - and exactly 6 months from the first post ever. As good a place as any to pick things…
Thus ends 2016, a quite tumultuous year for myself, and for the world. It’s been a year of great things, and sad things. A year of…
